supportedos: Windows Vista / XP / 7 (Software support 32bit OS only)
mainfeatures: 16.0 Mega pixels (interpolation), 5M CMOS sensor Support 20x zoom ( 5x Optical zoom and 4x digital zoom) 3 Inch TFT LCD touch display (16:9) High definition 1080P(30fps) video recording New generation camera lens Support SDHC card up to 32GB Class 6 Support NTSC/PAL/HDMI output
specifications: Model: HD-10Z High definition H.264 DV camera Sensor: 1/3.2"" 5.0 Mega-Pixel Sensor Max.Resolution: Fine 12.0 Mega-Pixel ( Firmware Interpolation ) Lens: 5x Optical zoom lens Wide : F2.83, f=4.98mm Tele : F4.95, f=23.6mm Movie zoom: 20x (5x Optical zoom, 4x digital zoom except QVGA / 1080p) Camera zoom: 20x (5x Optical zoom, 4x digital zoom) Focus Range: Normal Wide: 10cm ~ inf, Tele: 5cm ~ inf, marco wide: 1 ~ 50cm White Balance: Auto / Sunny / Cloudy / Tungsten / Fluorescent Exposure: - 2.0EV ~ +2.0EV Color Effects: Color / B&W / Sepia LED Light(Video): On / Off Effective Range LCD Display: 3.0 inch 16:9 TFT LCD Touch Display ( 960 x 240 Pixels ) Memory Card Slot: SDHC Card (Up to 32GB Class 6) Movie Clips: Format: H.264 (AVI). Resolution: 1080P(30fps), 720P(30fps), WVGA(60fps), QVGA(120fps) Still Image: Format: JPEG (EXIF2.2). Resolution: 3M / 5M / 12M ( Interpolation ) Self-Timer: Off / 5sec / 10sec Interface: PC : USB 2.0 (High Speed), Video : NTSC / PAL / HDMI (1080i Output) Set up Language: English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, German, Italian, Spanish, French, Turkish, Portuguese, Dutch, Japanese, Russian, Korean and Arabic Auto Power Off: Off / 1 min / 5 min Shutter: Still: 2 ~ 1/4000 sec. Video: 1/15 ~ 1/2000 sec Power Source: NP-120 Li-ion battery Weight: 223g (Without batteries) Dimension: 45 (W) x 60 (H) x 116 (D)mm Supported OS: Windows Vista / XP / 7 (Software support 32bit OS only)
packagecontents: 1 x Digital camcorder HD-10Z 1 x Li-ion Battery 1 x USB Cable / AV Cable 1 x HDMI Cable 1 x 110-240v Battery Charger 1 x CD-ROM software disc 1 x Camera Pouch 1 x User Manual
